text:
<optional title, max 6 words>

<setup: dim room, family in prayer>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Katerina: “Kneel, children. Pray with me.”

<blank line>

Lida: *trembling, eyes wide*  
Boy: *crossing himself* “I’m doing it right!”  
Katerina: *biting her lips* “Stay strong, my loves.”

---
<setup: crowded doorway, anxious spectators>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Polenka: *panting* “She’s coming! I saw her!”

<blank line>

Katerina: “Kneel beside me, Polenka.”  
Young girl: *timidly entering* “What’s happening here?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Katerina Ivanovna and her children kneel in prayer amidst a scene of despair and impending death, while a crowd gathers outside.
